verses.name: Acts 2:20
verses.text: The sun shall be turned into darkness, and the moon into blood, before that great and notable day of the Lord come:

verses.name: Acts 2:21
verses.text: And it shall come to pass, that whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be saved.

verses.name: Acts 2:22
verses.text: Ye men of Israel, hear these words; Jesus of Nazareth, a man approved of God among you by miracles and wonders and signs, which God did by him in the midst of you, as ye yourselves also know:
